goal.en: 1. Basic knowledge of business models 2. Understanding elements of business models 3. Designing business models
goal.ch: “成功修完本課程之同學應具備: 1. 商業模型學術理論的基本概念 2. 了解良好的商業模式應具備那些要素 3. 設計商業模型“

content.en: This course talks about three different business models (RTVN, Lean canvas and OBMC) and how to create value through those models.
content.ch: 本課程中將探討三種不同的商業模型(RTVN, Lean canvas and OBMC) 以及如何透過這些商業模型來創造價值。

textbook.en: “Required Text: A.J.Bock and G.George. 2018. ““The Business Model Book: Design, Build and Adapt Business that Thrive““ Pearson: 1st ed.
textbook.ch: “Required Text: A.J.Bock and G.George. 2018. ““The Business Model Book: Design, Build and Adapt Business that Thrive““ Pearson: 1st ed.

grading.ch: 課堂參與: 30％ 期中考: 30％ 期末報告: 40％

flex_desc.en: Students are required to find and study cases that are related to the subject of this course.
flex_desc.ch: Students are required to find and study cases that are related to the subject of this course.

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)

ch: 系所:限會計研究所碩士班。
